languages.text: {n}Синие прожилки статуи едва заметно вспыхивают под вашим взглядом. Без сомнения, камень обладает свойствами {g|Encyclopedia:PsyfocusGlossary}псифокуса{/g}, позволяя старику концентрировать в нем энергии варпа и усиливать их.{/n}

{n}The blue veins of the statue flare faintly under your gaze. The stone undoubtedly possesses {g|Encyclopedia:PsyfocusGlossary}psy-focus{/g} properties, allowing the old man to concentrate warp energies in it and amplify them.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Синие прожилки статуи едва заметно вспыхивают под вашим взглядом. Без сомнения, камень обладает свойствами {g|Encyclopedia:PsyfocusGlossary}псифокуса{/g}, позволяя старику концентрировать в нем энергии варпа и усиливать их.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die blauen Adern der Statue leuchten leicht unter deinem Blick. Der Stein enthält ohne Zweifel Eigenschaften eines {g|Encyclopedia:PsyfocusGlossary}Psi-Fokus{/g}, die es dem alten Mann erlauben, Warpenergien darin zu verdichten und zu verstärken.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The blue veins of the statue flare faintly under your gaze. The stone undoubtedly possesses {g|Encyclopedia:PsyfocusGlossary}psy-focus{/g} properties, allowing the old man to concentrate warp energies in it and amplify them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die blauen Adern der Statue leuchten leicht unter deinem Blick. Der Stein enthält ohne Zweifel Eigenschaften eines {g|Encyclopedia:PsyfocusGlossary}Psi-Fokus{/g}, die es dem alten Mann erlauben, Warpenergien darin zu verdichten und zu verstärken.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les veines bleues de la statue s'illuminent légèrement sous votre regard. La pierre possède sans nul doute possible des propriétés de {g|Encyclopedia:PsyfocusGlossary}focalisation psychique{/g}, permettant au vieil homme de canaliser les énergies du Warp pour mieux les amplifier.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The blue veins of the statue flare faintly under your gaze. The stone undoubtedly possesses {g|Encyclopedia:PsyfocusGlossary}psy-focus{/g} properties, allowing the old man to concentrate warp energies in it and amplify them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les veines bleues de la statue s'illuminent légèrement sous votre regard. La pierre possède sans nul doute possible des propriétés de {g|Encyclopedia:PsyfocusGlossary}focalisation psychique{/g}, permettant au vieil homme de canaliser les énergies du Warp pour mieux les amplifier.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你注视着雕像，雕像蓝色脉络散发着微弱的光芒。毫无疑问，这种水晶拥有{g|Encyclopedia:PsyfocusGlossary}灵能媒介{/g}的特性，老人可以将亚空间的能量凝聚在水晶之中，将其放大。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The blue veins of the statue flare faintly under your gaze. The stone undoubtedly possesses {g|Encyclopedia:PsyfocusGlossary}psy-focus{/g} properties, allowing the old man to concentrate warp energies in it and amplify them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你注视着雕像，雕像蓝色脉络散发着微弱的光芒。毫无疑问，这种水晶拥有{g|Encyclopedia:PsyfocusGlossary}灵能媒介{/g}的特性，老人可以将亚空间的能量凝聚在水晶之中，将其放大。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Las venas azules de la estatua se iluminan levemente ante tu mirada. No hay duda de que la piedra posee las propiedades de un {g|Encyclopedia:PsyfocusGlossary}foco psíquico{/g}, lo que permite al anciano concentrar energía disforme en ella y amplificarla.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The blue veins of the statue flare faintly under your gaze. The stone undoubtedly possesses {g|Encyclopedia:PsyfocusGlossary}psy-focus{/g} properties, allowing the old man to concentrate warp energies in it and amplify them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Las venas azules de la estatua se iluminan levemente ante tu mirada. No hay duda de que la piedra posee las propiedades de un {g|Encyclopedia:PsyfocusGlossary}foco psíquico{/g}, lo que permite al anciano concentrar energía disforme en ella y amplificarla.{/n}

languages.text: {n}彫像の青い筋がぼんやりとあなたの視線の下で輝く。この石は間違いなく{g|Encyclopedia:PsyfocusGlossary}超能力集中{/g}の特性を備えており、老人がその中に〈歪み〉エネルギーを集中させ、増幅することができる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The blue veins of the statue flare faintly under your gaze. The stone undoubtedly possesses {g|Encyclopedia:PsyfocusGlossary}psy-focus{/g} properties, allowing the old man to concentrate warp energies in it and amplify them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}彫像の青い筋がぼんやりとあなたの視線の下で輝く。この石は間違いなく{g|Encyclopedia:PsyfocusGlossary}超能力集中{/g}の特性を備えており、老人がその中に〈歪み〉エネルギーを集中させ、増幅することができる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heykelin mavi damarları, bakışların altında hafifçe parıldıyor. Taşın {g|Encyclopedia:PsyfocusGlossary}ruhsezi odağı{/g} olduğu aşikâr. Bu da ihtiyarın, taştaki öteboyut enerjilerini yoğunlaştırıp güçlendirebilmesini mümkün kılıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The blue veins of the statue flare faintly under your gaze. The stone undoubtedly possesses {g|Encyclopedia:PsyfocusGlossary}psy-focus{/g} properties, allowing the old man to concentrate warp energies in it and amplify them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heykelin mavi damarları, bakışların altında hafifçe parıldıyor. Taşın {g|Encyclopedia:PsyfocusGlossary}ruhsezi odağı{/g} olduğu aşikâr, ki bu da ihtiyarın taştaki öteboyut enerjilerini yoğunlaştırıp güçlendirebilmesini mümkün kılıyor.{/n}
